ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the earth and what extended it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The earth and its spreading out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the earth and by Him Who stretched it out;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the earth and that (Power) which spread it out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the earth and by oath of Him Who spread it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the earth and Ma Tahhaha.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth and Him Who extended it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and by the earth and That which extended it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the earth and Him Who spread it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by the earth and how He spread it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the earth and Him Who spread it forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the earth and Him who spread it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the earth and Him Who spread it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the earth and Who spread it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth and He who spread it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:6] and [by] the earth and the One Who spread it, laid out flat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth and Him who spread it) over the water,
